Package de.fhe.ai.model

Class Station

java.lang.Object
de.fhe.ai.model.ModelBase
de.fhe.ai.model.Traversable
de.fhe.ai.model.Station
public class Station
extends Traversable
A class that represents a Station for Trams to stop at and exchange passengers

  • Constructor Details

    • Station

      public Station​(int id, EventManager eventManager, TrafficManager trafficManager, java.lang.String name, float waitingTime, int maxPassengers, float length, int maxWeight, float trafficFactor)
      Initializes a new Station
      Parameters:
      id - the internal id of the station
      eventManager - the eventManager used to communicate with the TrafficManager, must be non-null
      name - the name of the station for public use, must be non-null and not empty
      waitingTime - the waiting time of this conenction in hours
      maxPassengers - the maximum amount of passengers that can be present on this station
      length - the length of this station in km
      maxWeight - the maximum allowed weight of a traverser, must be above positive or 0
      trafficFactor - the traversion factor, must be between 0 and 1.0f
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if invalid arguments are passed

    • setCurrentPassengers

      public void setCurrentPassengers​(int passengers)
      Attempts to set the current amount of passengers to the given number
      Parameters:
      passengers - the amount to set the current amount of passengers to, must be between 0 and maxPassengers
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given amount not between 0 and maxPassengers

    • addPassengers

      public void addPassengers​(int passengers)
      Attempts to add the given number of passengers to the given station
      Parameters:
      passengers - the amount of passengers to add to the station
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if it is attempted to add passengers past the maximum allowed passengers

    • removePassengers

      public void removePassengers​(int passengers)
      Attempts to remove the given number of passengers from the given station
      Parameters:
      passengers - the amount of passengers to remove from the station
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if it is attempted to remove more passengers than there are in the station

    • getTraversionTime

      public float getTraversionTime​(Tram tram)
      Description copied from class: Traversable
      Calculates the time in hours needed for a tram to traverse this traversable
      Overrides:
      getTraversionTime in class Traversable
      Parameters:
      tram - the tram to calcualte the traversion time for
      Returns:
      the traversion time in hours
